com.gleaserver.aps
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  com.gleaserver.aps.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Server

Version:
1.0 A Server Object that is intended to be run as an embedded thread. It listens for new connections and handles them accordingly.
Author:
aGleason
